gw.api.domain.invoice

Class InvoiceSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.domain.invoice.InvoiceSpecification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Predicate<Invoice>

    public class InvoiceSpecification
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.common.base.Predicate<Invoice>
    An InvoiceSpecification matches invoices that satisfy its criteria. It combines provided parameters to make the criteria.

    If there is no existing invoice that satisfies its criteria, then it may create a new invoice that does satisfy the criteria.

      • isSatisfiedBy

        public boolean isSatisfiedBy(Invoice invoice)
        An invoice satisfies this specification if it satisfies the status, bill date, due date, and ad hoc specifications
        Parameters:
        invoice - invoice to test against the specifications
        Returns:
        true if this InvoiceSpecification is satisfied by the given invoice, false otherwise
